      • selectWhere

        public java.sql.ResultSet selectWhere(java.lang.String table,
                             java.lang.String[] colNames,
                             java.lang.String[] whereFields,
                             java.lang.String[] whereOperators,
                             java.lang.String[] whereValues)
        Select the given columns from the given table that match the conditions set by the where clause.
        Parameters:
        table - the table containing the columns you wish to select.
        colNames - the names of the columns you wish to select.
        whereFields - the column names used to filter selections.
        whereOperators - the operators used for comparison like >, >=, =, <>, <, <=, LIKE, BETWEEN, and IN.
        whereValues - the values used to filter selections in the given whereFields.
        Returns:
        the ResultSet created by executing the SELECT WHERE statement.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

        whereOperators - the operators used for comparison like >, >=, =, <>, <, <=, LIKE, BETWEEN, and IN.
        whereValues - the values used to filter selections in the given whereFields.
        Returns:
        the ResultSet created by executing the DELETE WHERE statement.
